new: New editor settings tab, with several different customizable editor settings
Extension now hides old KA user survey popup
fixes: Improved button styling for Chrome
Vote button fixes for early versions of Chrome

new: Copy link button on program pages copies a shortened link to the program
You can now tell if your program has been hidden from the hotlist, from everywhere, or is guardian approved from the program stats section
Program titles are now centred in the middle of the page
Program page is now themed blue, like the rest of KA's ui
fixes: Hovercards have now been added back to project pages

new: You can now reply to notifications from within the popup
Overhaul of the notification page, with new styling and layout
Notifications page now uses infinite scrolling instead of the load more button

new: None
fixes: Fixed update log issue

new: None
fixes: Fixed location text editing
Dark theme toggle now appears when editing a new program
Program info now reloads when switching between editor tabs

new: Updated vote button with the ability to undo your votes
The extension has been released on FireFox
fixes: Fixed the toggle editor button in Chrome
Removed unused permissions

new: Complete TypeScript rewrite
Notifications can now be viewed through the extension popup
Tips & Thanks threads can now be downloaded as JSON files
Tips & Thanks can now be reported
Badge totals have been added to user profiles
fixes: Comment edits are now escaped properly
The KAdefine issue has been sorted out

new: Added a hide editor button
fixes: Improved some program info styling
Fixed URL coverage for programs (cs/pixar/computer-science)
Fixed small HTML parsing bug for comment editing
Total number of votes on profile is now accurate. It no longer counts the automatic vote
Extension now works in different KA subdomains
Removed the thumbnail feature

new: Added some evaluation tools
Added user/program reporting. Programs and users you report will go into a Google Sheet monitored by KA Guardian Evan Lewis
You can now add duplicate badges to your showcase
fixes: Improved some notification styling
You can now see your own program's flags
Fixed a notif deletion bug

new: Added a dark theme for the editor
You can now change your location text easily, in profile settings
You can now delete notifications
Added the ability to edit comments
You can now link to a specific comment from a user's discussion page
fixes: Fixed a notification bug which stopped the number of notifications from displaying properly
